DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , reference-controlled 4-month pilot safety study evaluate effect specific lipid fractions-enriched infant formula growth infant age 0-4 month . The study test hypothesis growth infant feed specific lipid fractions-enriched infant formula noninferior growth infant feed standard infant formula .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Specific Lipid Fractions-enriched Infant Formulae
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Infant ≤14 day old day enrollment Gestational age ≥37 week ( full term infant ) Birth weight ≥2500 g ≤4500 g Singleton birth Having obtain his/her parents'/legal representative 's informed consent Having significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease and/or congenital illness malformation may affect normal growth . Infant undergoing antibiotic therapy . Rehospitalization 2 day first 14 day life . Parents expect comply protocol period study participation . Infants currently participate another trial
